params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.translations
params.description: Text translation responses with no glossary applied. This field has the same length as [contents][google.cloud.translation.v3.TranslateTextRequest.contents].

params.name: data.glossary_translations
params.description: Text translation responses if a glossary is provided in the request. This can be the same as [translations][google.cloud.translation.v3.TranslateTextResponse.translations] if no terms apply. This field has the same length as [contents][google.cloud.translation.v3.TranslateTextRequest.contents].
